tool_description: This api gives the details about the Covid19 news
name: covid19-news-updates
title: covid19-news-updates

api_list.name: To get individual request
api_list.description: This api helps you categorise based on newpapers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid19-news-updates.p.rapidapi.com/news/telegraph"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid19-news-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid19-news-updates.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newpaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid19-news-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
